name: registro-documentos-clinicos
description: Aplicación de escritorio para registro de documentos clínicos

scripts.dist:portable: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force build | Out-Null; Compress-Archive -Path .\venv -DestinationPath .\build\venv.zip -Force; .\node_modules\.bin\electron-builder.cmd --win portable"
scripts.build: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Continue'; Get-Process | Where-Object ProcessName -like 'Medihelp*' | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue .\dist-build; $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force build | Out-Null; Compress-Archive -Path .\venv -DestinationPath .\build\venv.zip -Force; .\node_modules\.bin\electron-builder.cmd --win portable"
